00020 //----------------------------------------------------------
00021 UBlockAllocator::UBlockAllocator( unsigned int itemSize, unsigned int itemsPerBlock )
00022 : _blocks( 0 )
00023 , _curBlock( 0 )
00024 , _curBlockItem( 0 )
00025 , _itemSize( itemSize )
00026 , _itemsPerBlock( itemsPerBlock )
00027 {
00028 
00029 }
00030 
00031 //----------------------------------------------------------
00032 UBlockAllocator::~UBlockAllocator()
00033 {
00034         FreeMem();
00035 }
00036 
00037 
00038 //==========================================================
00040 //==========================================================
00041 
00042 //----------------------------------------------------------
00043 void*
00044 UBlockAllocator::AllocMem()
00045 {
00046         if ( _curBlock == 0 )
00047         {
00048                 B_ASSERT( _blocks == 0 );
00049                 _blocks = AllocBlock();
00050                 _curBlock = _blocks;
00051         }
00052         else if ( _curBlockItem == _itemsPerBlock )
00053         {
00054                 _curBlockItem = 0;
00055                 _curBlock->next = AllocBlock();
00056                 _curBlock = _curBlock->next;
00057         }
00058 
00060         unsigned char* mem = _curBlock->objectMem + ( _curBlockItem * _itemSize );
00061         ++_curBlockItem;
00062 
00064         return mem;
00065 }
00066 
00067 //----------------------------------------------------------
00068 void
00069 UBlockAllocator::FreeMem()
00070 {
00072         SBlock* curBlock = _blocks;
00073         while ( curBlock )
00074         {
00077                 SBlock* deadBlock = curBlock;
00078                 curBlock = curBlock->next;
00079 
00081                 delete[] deadBlock->objectMem;
00082                 delete deadBlock;
00083         }
00084 
00086         _curBlock = 0;
00087         _blocks = 0;
00088         _curBlockItem = 0;
00089 }
00090 
00091 
00092 //==========================================================
00094 //==========================================================
00095 
00096 //----------------------------------------------------------
00097 UBlockAllocator::SBlock*
00098 UBlockAllocator::AllocBlock()
00099 {
00101         SBlock* newBlock = new SBlock;
00102         newBlock->objectMem = new unsigned char[ _itemsPerBlock * _itemSize ];
00103         newBlock->next = 0;
00104         return newBlock;
00105 }
